verses.verse: Then<WG1161> said he<WG2036> unto<WG4314> the disciples<WG3101>, It is<WG2076> impossible<WG418><WG99999> to avoid the offenses<WG4625> that will come<WG2064>: but<WG1161> woe<WG3759> unto him<WG1223>, through whom<WG3739> they come<WG2064>!

It would be better<WG3081> for him<WG846> if<WG1487> a millstone<WG3458><WG99999> were hung<WG4029> about<WG4012> his<WG846> neck<WG5137>, and<WG2532> he were thrown<WG4496> into<WG1519> the sea<WG2281>, than<WG2228> that<WG2443> he should offend<WG4624> one<WG1520> of these<WG5130> little ones<WG3398>.

Take care<WG4337> to yourselves<WG1161>: If<WG1437> your<WG4675> brother<WG80> trespasses<WG264> against<WG1519> you<WG4571>, rebuke<WG2008> him<WG846>; and<WG2532> if<WG1437> he repents<WG3340>, forgive<WG863> him<WG846>.

And<WG2532> if<WG1437> he trespasses<WG264> against<WG1519> you<WG4571> seven times<WG2034> in a day<WG2250>, and<WG2532> seven times<WG2034> in a day<WG2250> turn again<WG1994> to<WG1909> you<WG4571>, saying<WG3004>, I repent<WG3340>; you shall forgive<WG863> him<WG846>.
And<WG2532> the apostles<WG652> said<WG2036> unto the Lord<WG2962>, Increase<WG4369> our<WG2254> faith<WG4102>.

And<WG1161> the Lord<WG2962> said<WG2036>, If<WG1487> you had<WG2192> faith<WG4102> as<WG5613> a grain<WG2848> of mustard seed<WG4615>, you would say<WG3004><WG99999> to this<WG3778> sycamore tree<WG4807>, Be plucked up by the roots<WG1610>, and<WG2532> be planted<WG5452> in<WG1722> the sea<WG2281>; and<WG2532> it would obey<WG5219><WG99999> you<WG5213>.

But<WG1161> which<WG5101> of<WG1537> you<WG5216>, having<WG2192> a servant<WG1401> plowing<WG722> or<WG2228> feeding cattle<WG4165>, will say<WG2046><WG99999> unto him<WG3739> by and by<WG2046>, when he has come<WG1525> from<WG1537> the field<WG68>, Go<WG3928> and sit down to food<WG377>?

And<WG235> will<WG2046> not rather<WG3780> say<WG2046> unto him<WG846>, Make ready<WG2090> so<WG5101> that I may eat supper<WG1172>, and<WG2532> clothe yourself<WG4024>, and serve<WG1247> me<WG3427>, while<WG2193> I eat<WG5315> and<WG2532> drink<WG4095>; and<WG2532> later<WG3326><WG99999> you<WG4771> shall eat<WG5315> and<WG2532> drink<WG4095>?
Does he<WG2192><WG99999> thank<WG5485> that<WG1565> servant<WG1401> because<WG3754> he did<WG4160> the things that<WG3588> were commanded<WG1299> him<WG846>? I think<WG1380> not<WG3756>.

So<WG3779> likewise<WG2532> you<WG5210>, when<WG3752> you shall have done<WG4160> all<WG3956> those things which<WG3588> are commanded<WG1299> you<WG5213>, say<WG3004>, We are<WG2070> unprofitable<WG888> servants<WG3754>: we have done<WG4160> that which<WG3739><WG99999> was our duty<WG3784> to do<WG4160>.

And<WG2532> it came to pass<WG1096>, as<WG1722> he<WG846> went<WG4198> to<WG1519> Jerusalem<WG2419>, that<WG2532> he<WG846> passed<WG1330> through<WG1223> the middle<WG3319> of Samaria<WG4540> and<WG2532> Galilee<WG1056>.

And<WG2532> as he<WG846> entered<WG1525> into<WG1519> a certain<WG5100> village<WG2968>, there met<WG528> him<WG846> ten<WG1176> men<WG435> that were lepers<WG3015>, which<WG3739> stood<WG2476> afar off<WG4207>:
And<WG2532> they<WG846> lifted up<WG142> their voices<WG5456>, and said<WG3004>, Jesus<WG2424>, Master<WG1988>, have mercy<WG1653> on us<WG2248>.

And<WG2532> when he saw<WG1492> them<WG2036>, he said unto them<WG846>, Go<WG4198> show<WG1925> yourselves<WG1438> unto the priests<WG2409>. And<WG2532> it came to pass<WG1096>, that, as<WG1722> they went<WG5217>, they<WG846> were cleansed<WG2511>.

And<WG1161> one<WG1520> of<WG1537> them<WG846>, when he saw<WG1492> that<WG3754> he was healed<WG2390>, turned back<WG5290>, and with<WG3326> a loud<WG3173> voice<WG5456> glorified<WG1392> God<WG2316>,
And<WG2532> fell down<WG4098> on<WG1909> his face<WG4383> at<WG3844> his<WG846> feet<WG4228>, giving<WG2168> him<WG846> thanks<WG2168>: and<WG2532> he<WG846> was<WG2258> a Samaritan<WG4541>.
And<WG1161> Jesus<WG2424> answering<WG611> said<WG2036>, Were there<WG2511> not<WG3780> ten<WG1176> cleansed<WG2511>? But<WG1161> where<WG4226> are the nine<WG1767>?
There are<WG2147> not<WG3756> found<WG2147> any that returned<WG5290> to give<WG1325> glory<WG1391> to God<WG2316>, except<WG1487><WG99999> this<WG3778> stranger<WG241>.
And<WG2532> he said<WG2036> to him<WG846>, Arise<WG450>, go your way<WG4198>: your<WG4675> faith<WG4102> has made<WG4982> you<WG4571> whole<WG4982>.

And<WG1161> when he was questioned<WG1905> by<WG5259> the Pharisees<WG5330>, when<WG4219> the kingdom<WG932> of God<WG2316> would come<WG2064>, he answered<WG611> them<WG846> and<WG2532> said<WG2036>, The kingdom<WG932> of God<WG2316> comes<WG2064> not<WG3756> with<WG3326> observation<WG3907>:

Neither<WG3761> shall they say<WG2046>, Behold<WG2400> here<WG5602>! Or<WG2228>, behold<WG2400> there<WG1563>! For<WG1063>, behold<WG2400>, the kingdom<WG932> of God<WG2316> is<WG2076> inside<WG1787> you<WG5216>.

And<WG1161> he said<WG2036> to<WG4314> the disciples<WG3101>, The days<WG2250> will come<WG2064>, when<WG3753> you shall desire<WG1937> to see<WG1492> one<WG1520> of the days<WG2250> of the Son<WG5207> of man<WG444>, and<WG2532> you shall<WG3700> not<WG3756> see it<WG3700>.
And<WG2532> they shall say<WG2046> to you<WG5213>, See<WG2400> here<WG5602>; or<WG2228>, see<WG2400> there<WG1563>: go<WG565> not<WG3361> after<WG565> them<WG3366>, nor follow them<WG1377>.

For<WG1063> as<WG5618> the lightning<WG796>, that lightens<WG797> out of<WG1537> the one<WG3588> part under<WG5259> heaven<WG3772>, shines<WG2989> to<WG1519> the other<WG3588> part under<WG5259> heaven<WG3772>; so<WG3779> shall<WG2071> also<WG2532> the Son<WG5207> of man<WG444> be<WG2071> in<WG1722> his<WG846> day<WG2250>.
But<WG1161> first<WG4412> must<WG1163> he<WG846> suffer<WG3958> many things<WG4183>, and<WG2532> be rejected<WG593> of<WG575> this<WG3778> generation<WG1074>.
And<WG2532> as<WG2531> it was<WG1096> in<WG1722> the days<WG2250> of Noah<WG3575>, so<WG3779> shall it be<WG2071> also<WG2532> in<WG1722> the days<WG2250> of the Son<WG5207> of man<WG444>.

They ate<WG2068>, they drank<WG4095>, they married wives<WG1060>, they were given in marriage<WG1547>, until<WG891> the day<WG2250> that<WG3739> Noah<WG3575> entered<WG1525> into<WG1519> the ark<WG2787>, and<WG2532> the flood<WG2627> came<WG2064>, and<WG2532> destroyed<WG622> them all<WG537>.

Likewise<WG3668> also<WG2532> as<WG5613> it was<WG1096> in<WG1722> the days<WG2250> of Lot<WG3091>; they did eat<WG2068>, they drank<WG4095>, they bought<WG59>, they sold<WG4453>, they planted<WG5452>, they built<WG3618>;

But<WG1161> the same day<WG2250> that<WG3739> Lot<WG3091> went<WG1831> out<WG575> of Sodom<WG4670> it rained<WG1026> fire<WG4442> and<WG2532> brimstone<WG2303> from<WG575> heaven<WG3772>, and<WG2532> destroyed<WG622> them all<WG537>.
Even<WG2596> so<WG5024> shall it be<WG2071> in<WG3739> the day<WG2250> when<WG601> the Son<WG5207> of man<WG444> is revealed<WG5023>.

In<WG1722> that<WG1565> day<WG2250>, he which<WG3739> shall be<WG2071> upon<WG1909> the housetop<WG1430>, and<WG2532> his<WG846> stuff<WG4632> in<WG1722> the house<WG3614>, let him<WG2597> not<WG3361> come down<WG2597> to take<WG142> it<WG846> away<WG142>: and<WG2532> he that is<WG3588> in<WG1722> the field<WG68>, let him<WG1994> likewise<WG3668> not<WG3361> return<WG1994><WG99999> back<WG3694>.
Remember<WG3421> Lot<WG3091>'s wife<WG1135>.

Whoever<WG3739><WG99999> shall seek<WG2212> to save<WG4982> his<WG846> life<WG5590> shall lose<WG622> it<WG846>; and<WG2532> whoever<WG3739><WG99999> shall lose<WG622> his life<WG846> shall preserve<WG2225> it<WG846>.

I tell<WG3004> you<WG5213>, in that<WG3778> night<WG3571> there shall be<WG2071> two<WG1417> men in<WG1909> one<WG1520> bed<WG2825>; the one<WG1520> shall be taken<WG3880>, and<WG2532> the other<WG2087> shall be left<WG863>.
Two<WG1417> women shall be<WG2071> grinding<WG229><WG99999> together<WG846>; the one<WG1520> shall be taken<WG3880>, and<WG2532> the other<WG2087> left<WG863>.
Two<WG1417> men shall be<WG2071> in<WG1722> the field<WG68>; the one<WG1520> shall be taken<WG3880>, and<WG2532> the other<WG2087> left<WG863>.

And<WG2532> they answered<WG611> and said<WG3004> to him<WG846>, Where<WG4226>, Lord<WG2962>? And<WG1161> he said<WG2036> to them<WG846>, Wherever<WG3699> the body<WG4983> is<WG1563>, there will<WG4863> the vultures<WG105> be gathered together<WG4863>.
